WorkItem.Description:
I am using the datepicker control in an xbap application running under partial trust - internet zone, this way i do not need to issue certificates.
when browsing throught the datepicker and ultimately selecting a date, I get an ui permission error.
If the UIPermission is changes to "All windows and Events", it works, but now i need to sign it and issue certificates.
 
They previous release of the toolkit did not have this issue.
 
Any ideas?

Comments.Message: I have the same issue with WPFToolkit 3.5.40128.1

Personally, I consider this issue as a showstopper. We publish applications in internet and can't elevate permissions.

I haven't seen it with previous versions of WPFToolkit.
